00044 class Viewport 
00045 {
00046     private:
00047         Point2d rmin;
00048         Point2d rmax;

00053             throw(std::invalid_argument);

00056 
00057 
00058         bool isInside(double wx, double wy) const;
00059         
00061         template<class PointType>
00062         bool isInside(const PointType& p) const ;
00064     
00066         bool isValid() const { return width() > 0 && height() > 0; }
00067         
00068         double  width() const { return rmax.x - rmin.x; };
00069         double height() const { return rmax.y - rmin.y; };
00070         
00072         std::string toString() throw();

00075         const Point2d & getMax() const { return rmax; }

00172 
00175 template<class D=double>
00176 class AffineView {
00177     D rmin, rmax;
00178     int imin, imax;
00179     
00180     public:
00181     
00182     AffineView(D rmin, D rmax, int imin, int imax):
00183         rmin(rmin), rmax(rmax), imin(imin), imax(imax) {
00184         assert(rmax>rmin);
00185     }
00186     
00187     bool w2b(double r, int& i) {
00188         if( r<rmin || r>rmax) return false;
00189         i = (int) (imin + (imax-imin) * (r-rmin) / (rmax-rmin));
00190         i = std::max( std::min(i,imax), imin);
00191         return true;
00192     }
00193 };
